markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[First World Adept](/Feats.aspx?ID=4433) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 53 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
at least one primal innate spell

</column>

---

Over time your fey magic has grown stronger. You gain [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) and [_revealing light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1653) as 2nd-rank primal innate spells. You can cast each of these primal innate spells once per day.
name: First World Adept
prerequisite: at least one primal innate spell
prerequisite_markdown: at least one primal innate spell

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 9" pfs="Standard" > First World Adept Source Player Core pg. 53 2.0 Prerequisites at least one primal innate spell --- Over time your fey magic has grown stronger. You gain invisibility and revealing light as 2nd-rank primal innate spells. You can cast each of these primal innate spells once per day.
